name: T-Rex Dino Skate
description:
Based on the classic chrome dinosaur game, added color and increased gameplay plus different environments like snow and desert, and instead of running you go on a skateboard.

                   

The same controls as in the chrome dinosaur game:

  • Space key to jump
  • Down arrow to crouch

                                                        

Also available on GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/t-rex-dino-skate/744230

thanks for playing my game :)
